name: Candy Maniac Lite
description:
Enter the world of the Candy Maniac as you try to move up the ranks in his candy factory. Draw lines on your screen to connect 3 or more candies. Make longer chains to earn bombs and more points.

Unlock new candies and move up the ladder from Candy Wrapper all the way to Candy Maniac.

Then, play to get the world’s highest score on the global leaderboard.

See if you have what it takes to make it to the top and become the Candy Maniac!
